customer_journey.awareness: Patient experiences symptoms or receives abnormal test results from primary care, begins researching specialists through insurance provider directories, online reviews, and physician referrals. 73% start with insurance website, 45% ask for PCP recommendations, 82% read online reviews before calling
customer_journey.consideration: Evaluates 3-5 specialists based on credentials, wait times, insurance acceptance, location proximity within 15-mile radius, and patient reviews above 4.2 stars. Calls offices to verify insurance, inquire about new patient availability within 2-3 weeks, and understands consultation fees ranging $250-$500
customer_journey.decision: Books appointment with specialist offering earliest availability combined with strongest credentials, typically within 14-21 days. 67% choose based on wait time under 3 weeks, 89% require in-network coverage, 45% influenced by same-day callback from office staff
customer_journey.retention: Continues care based on treatment effectiveness measured by 30% symptom improvement within 60 days, staff responsiveness with callbacks within 24 hours, appointment availability within 7 days for follow-ups, and insurance claim processing accuracy above 95%
customer_journey.advocacy: Refers others after experiencing 50% or greater improvement in condition, receiving compassionate care during vulnerable moments, and having complex insurance issues resolved by practice staff. 34% actively refer within 6 months, generating average 2.3 new patients per advocate

[43-52 sec] 'Bonus tip: Call ahead and verify your insurance. We can help with that. Removes SO much stress.' - helpful smile

[53-58 sec] 'Come prepared, get better answers. Simple as that.' - confident nod

educational.body:
Hi [FIRST_NAME],

Your appointment with Dr. [SPECIALIST_NAME] is coming up on [DATE] at [TIME], and we want you to feel completely prepared.

**HERE'S WHAT TO BRING:**
✓ Photo ID and insurance card
✓ Referral from your primary care doctor (if required by insurance)
✓ List of current medications (including dosages)
✓ Any recent test results or imaging (we can also request these)
✓ Written list of symptoms and questions

**WHAT WILL HAPPEN:**
Your first visit will last approximately [X] minutes. You'll spend time with Dr. [NAME], not just a physician assistant. We'll:

• Review your complete medical history
• Discuss your symptoms in detail
• Perform a comprehensive [SPECIALTY] examination
• Order any necessary diagnostic tests
• Develop a personalized treatment plan together

**IMPORTANT LOGISTICS:**
📍 Location: [ADDRESS] - [PARKING INSTRUCTIONS]
⏰ Please arrive 15 minutes early to complete paperwork
💼 We've verified your [INSURANCE NAME] coverage—your estimated copay is [$XX]
📱 Need to reschedule? Call [PHONE] or reply to this email

**YOUR QUESTIONS MATTER:**
Many patients feel nervous about specialist appointments. That's completely normal. Please know:

→ We've heard it all—there's no need to feel embarrassed
→ We don't rush—you'll have time to discuss everything
→ We work WITH your primary care doctor, not instead of
→ Our goal is to help you feel better, not just diagnose

**HAVE QUESTIONS BEFORE YOUR VISIT?**
Reply to this email or call our patient care team at [PHONE]. We're here Monday-Friday, [HOURS].

We're looking forward to meeting you and starting your journey to relief.

Warm regards,

[PRACTICE NAME] Patient Care Team

P.S. Download our new patient forms here [LINK] to save time at your appointment.
